title: West Virginia - poverty rate from 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.

Percentage of population is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 18.6 was reported at Year 2011
The lowest Percentage of population, of value 16.9 was reported at Year 2007
min_summary: In general Percentage of population has stayed the same over the Year.
